titleStmt.title: Sir Martin Mar-people, his coller of esses Workmanly vvrought by Maister Simon Sooth-saier, coldsmith [sic] of London. And offered to sale vpon great necessity, by Iohn Dauies.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, Sir, 1569-1626, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Sir John Davies.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
